Operation 'adsensehost.associationsessions.start' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Original had no summary and vague description. Added summary to clearly indicate the action. Enhanced description to explain: the purpose (initiating association), what is created (session with ID and callback URL), authentication requirements, expected return value (AssociationSession object), and the session lifecycle. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_description: Create an association session for initiating an association with an AdSense user.
data.description_suggestion: Initiates a new association session to begin the process of associating a publisher with an AdSense account. This operation generates a unique session identifier and returns the session details including a callback URL for the AdSense signup flow. The session remains active until verified or expires. Requires authentication as an AdSense Host. Returns an AssociationSession object containing the session ID and redirect URL for the publisher to complete signup.
data.reasoning: Original had no summary and vague description. Added summary to clearly indicate the action. Enhanced description to explain: the purpose (initiating association), what is created (session with ID and callback URL), authentication requirements, expected return value (AssociationSession object), and the session lifecycle. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

message: Operation 'adsensehost.associationsessions.verify' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Original had no summary and incomplete description. Added summary to clearly indicate verification action. Enhanced description to explain: the trigger condition (after callback received), what happens (session state transition to verified), required input (session ID), expected output (verified AssociationSession), and the operational context (part of multi-step association flow). This clarifies for AI agents the prerequisite conditions and proper sequencing of operations.

data.current_description: Verify an association session after the association callback returns from AdSense signup.
data.description_suggestion: Verifies an association session after the publisher completes the AdSense signup flow and the callback is received. This operation confirms the association between the publisher and their AdSense account, transitioning the session from pending to verified state. Requires the session ID as input. Returns the verified AssociationSession object with updated status. This operation should be called after receiving the callback notification from AdSense to finalize the publisher association.
data.reasoning: Original had no summary and incomplete description. Added summary to clearly indicate verification action. Enhanced description to explain: the trigger condition (after callback received), what happens (session state transition to verified), required input (session ID), expected output (verified AssociationSession), and the operational context (part of multi-step association flow). This clarifies for AI agents the prerequisite conditions and proper sequencing of operations.
